body: LEAD: All eyes were on Julio Iglesias at the fourth annual Crystal Ball on May 4, which benefited Mount Sinai Medical Center. body: LEAD: IT was once Coney Island's Statue of Liberty, an impressive symbol beckoning to passing oceanliners. But now the Half Moon Hotel, having spent its waning years as the Metropolitan Jewish Geriatric Center nursing home, is scheduled for demolition as soon as the home completes a new building. title: STREETSCAPES: The Half Moon Hotel; A Symbol of Coney Island Is About to Be Eclipsed

body: LEAD: Yvonne L. Little, a 56-year-old Maryland resident, caught the belt of her raincoat in an escalator step when she was leaving a subway station in suburban Washington earlier this month. Ms. Little, unaware, rode to the top of the moving stairs. The machinery reeled in the belt and yanked her to the ground, breaking her wrist, dislocating her
title: CONSUMER'S WORLD; Escalator Dangers Called Preventable

title: Why Do We Fight Fires With Drinking Water?

body: LEAD: Most of the time, New Yorkers dart determinedly from point A to point B, or wander about the city oblivious to the cultural, historical and architectural riches in their midst. title: Urban Adventures: Touring by the Book

body: LEAD: Julius Eichel, a conscientious objector in World Wars I and II who was twice charged with refusing to register for the draft, died Friday after surgery at Coney Island Hospital. title: Julius Eichel, at 93, Conscientious Objector

title: WESTCHESTER OPINION; When the Ballpark Cost Just a Nickel

body: LEAD: Astroland Amusement Park will open Sunday - weather permitting -and will be open on subsequent weekends until mid-June. Hours are noon to midnight Saturdays and Sundays. Astroland is at West 10th Street between Surf Avenue and the Boardwalk, Coney Island, brooklyn. Admission is free; individual rides cost $1 to $3. Astroland Amusement Park
title: Astroland to Open

title: Jersey Is Moving Cautiously Against Accused Polluter

title: Queens and Brooklyn Give Subway Improvements Bronx Cheer; Isolated in Sea Beach
